Peninsula on the East, has been identified as a Priority Area for Integrated Management Planning. Successful development in this area relies upon an understanding of the health and condition of the Placentia Bay marine and coastal environment, and baseline data to detect changes related to management and external impacts.

To provide scientific data pertaining to the current state of the Placentia Bay, Northeast Avalon Atlantic Coastal Action Program (NAACAP) is conducting a Shoreline Environmental Baseline Program focused on assessing shoreline character and water properties in Placentia Bay. The program design involves sample collection at 8 representative coastal sites in Placentia Bay, 4-times per year, over a 3 1⁄2 -year period from October 2018 to March 2022</gco:CharacterString>

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-htnx-ef17
notes:
Placentia Bay, on the Southeast coast of Newfoundland formed by the Burin Peninsula on the west and the Avalon
Peninsula on the East, has been identified as a Priority Area for Integrated Management Planning. Successful development in this area relies upon an understanding of the health and condition of the Placentia Bay marine and coastal environment, and baseline data to detect changes related to management and external impacts.

To provide scientific data pertaining to the current state of the Placentia Bay, Northeast Avalon Atlantic Coastal Action Program (NAACAP) is conducting a Shoreline Environmental Baseline Program focused on assessing shoreline character and water properties in Placentia Bay. The program design involves sample collection at 8 representative coastal sites in Placentia Bay, 4-times per year, over a 3 1⁄2 -year period from October 2018 to March 2022

notes_translated.en:
Placentia Bay, on the Southeast coast of Newfoundland formed by the Burin Peninsula on the west and the Avalon
Peninsula on the East, has been identified as a Priority Area for Integrated Management Planning. Successful development in this area relies upon an understanding of the health and condition of the Placentia Bay marine and coastal environment, and baseline data to detect changes related to management and external impacts.

To provide scientific data pertaining to the current state of the Placentia Bay, Northeast Avalon Atlantic Coastal Action Program (NAACAP) is conducting a Shoreline Environmental Baseline Program focused on assessing shoreline character and water properties in Placentia Bay. The program design involves sample collection at 8 representative coastal sites in Placentia Bay, 4-times per year, over a 3 1⁄2 -year period from October 2018 to March 2022
notes_translated.fr:
La baie Placentia, sur la côte sud-est de Terre-Neuve, formée par la péninsule de Burin à l'ouest et l'Avalon
Péninsule à l'est, a été identifiée comme zone prioritaire pour la planification de la gestion intégrée. Le succès du développement dans cette zone repose sur une compréhension de la santé et de l'état de l'environnement marin et côtier de la baie Placentia, ainsi que sur des données de référence permettant de détecter les changements liés à la gestion et aux impacts externes.

Afin de fournir des données scientifiques relatives à l'état actuel de la baie de Placentia, le Northeast Avalon Atlantic Coastal Action Program (NAACAP) mène un programme de référence environnementale du littoral axé sur l'évaluation du caractère du littoral et des propriétés de l'eau dans la baie Placentia. La conception du programme comprend le prélèvement d'échantillons sur 8 sites côtiers représentatifs de la baie Placentia, 4 fois par an, sur une période de 3 ans et demi d'octobre 2018 à mars 2022

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: Shoreline Environmental Baseline Surveys in Placentia Bay, NL: A shoreline characterization and assessment of biogeochemistry, nutrients, coliforms, and hydrocarbons.

title_translated.fr: Études environnementales de référence sur le littoral dans la baie de Placentia, à Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador : caractérisation du littoral et évaluation de la biogéochimie, des nutriments, des coliformes et des hydrocarbures.
